info.name: Boosty Platform API
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for the Boosty solar investment platform backend

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 5000ms", function () {

query.description: Search term for name, email, or phone

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Welcome Email",
  "description": "Template for welcoming new users",
  "subject": "Welcome to Boosty Platform",
  "content": "Hello {{userName}}, welcome to Boosty Platform!",
  "type": "email",
  "category": "onboarding",
  "variables": ["userName", "companyName"],
  "isActive": true
}

{
  "name": "Updated Welcome Email",
  "description": "Updated template for welcoming new users",
  "subject": "Welcome to Boosty Platform - Updated",
  "content": "Hello {{userName}}, welcome to the updated Boosty Platform!",
  "isActive": true
}

query.description: Number of scheduled exports per page

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Weekly User Export",
  "description": "Export active users every week",
  "frequency": "weekly",
  "dayOfWeek": 1,
  "time": "09:00",
  "format": "xlsx",
  "fields": ["name", "email", "phone", "status"],
  "filters": {
    "status": "active"
  },
  "recipients": ["admin@example.com"],
  "isActive": true
}

query.description: Number of history items per page

body.raw:
{
  "investorIds": ["investorId1", "investorId2"],
  "type": "email",
  "subject": "Investment Update",
  "message": "Dear investor, here is your latest investment update",
  "template": "investment-update",
  "sendImmediately": true
}

query.description: Number of KYC records per page
